description: You can interact with Alexa to know courses offered, holidays and events happening with various providers. No more worries to dig the information from provider websites, here you will get your answers and plan accordingly.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask virtual academy what are the events in may
Alexa, ask virtual academy what are the courses in january
Alexa, ask virtual academy what are the holidays in march
name: Virtual Academy
shortDescription: Ask Virtual Academy about upcoming events, courses and holidays.
